an6.44:1.1: Atha kho ayasma anando pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena migasalaya upasikaya nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
an6.44:1.2: Atha kho migasala upasika yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinna kho migasala upasika ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
an6.44:2.1: “Katham katham namayam, bhante ananda, bhagavata dhammo desito anneyyo, yatra hi nama brahmacari ca abrahmacari ca ubho samasamagatika bhavissanti abhisamparayam?
an6.44:2.2: Pita me, bhante, purano brahmacari ahosi aracari virato methuna gamadhamma.
an6.44:2.3: So kalankato bhagavata byakato sakadagami satto tusitam kayam upapannoti.
an6.44:2.4: Petteyyopi me, bhante, isidatto abrahmacari ahosi sadarasantuttho.
an6.44:2.5: Sopi kalankato bhagavata byakato sakadagamipatto tusitam kayam upapannoti.
an6.44:2.6: Katham katham namayam, bhante ananda, bhagavata dhammo desito anneyyo, yatra hi nama brahmacari ca abrahmacari ca ubho samasamagatika bhavissanti abhisamparayan”ti?
an6.44:3.1: Atha kho ayasma anando migasalaya upasikaya nivesane pindapatam gahetva utthayasana pakkami.
an6.44:3.2: Atha kho ayasma anando pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.44:4.1: “Idhaham, bhante, pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena migasalaya upasikaya nivesanam tenupasankamim; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidim.
an6.44:4.2: Atha kho, bhante, migasala upasika yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinna kho, bhante, migasala upasika mam etadavoca:
an6.44:4.3: ‘katham katham namayam, bhante ananda, bhagavata dhammo desito anneyyo, yatra hi nama brahmacari ca abrahmacari ca ubho samasamagatika bhavissanti abhisamparayam.
an6.44:4.4: Pita me, bhante, purano brahmacari ahosi aracari virato methuna gamadhamma.
an6.44:4.5: So kalankato bhagavata byakato sakadagamipatto tusitam kayam upapannoti.
an6.44:4.6: Petteyyopi me, bhante, isidatto abrahmacari ahosi sadarasantuttho.
an6.44:4.7: Sopi kalankato bhagavata byakato sakadagamipatto tusitam kayam upapannoti.
an6.44:4.8: Katham katham namayam, bhante ananda, bhagavata dhammo desito anneyyo, yatra hi nama brahmacari ca abrahmacari ca ubho samasamagatika bhavissanti abhisamparayan’ti?
an6.44:4.9: Evam vutte, aham, bhante, migasalam upasikam etadavocam:
an6.44:5.1: “Ka cananda, migasala upasika bala abyatta ammaka ammakapanna, ke ca purisapuggalaparopariyanane?
an6.44:5.2: Chayime, ananda, puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an6.44:6.2: Idhananda, ekacco puggalo sorato hoti sukhasamvaso, abhinandanti sabrahmacari ekattavasena.
an6.44:6.3: Tassa savanenapi akatam hoti, bahusaccenapi akatam hoti, ditthiyapi appatividdham hoti, samayikampi vimuttim na labhati.
an6.44:6.4: So kayassa bheda param marana hanaya pareti no visesaya, hanagamiyeva hoti no visesagami.
an6.44:7.1: Idha panananda, ekacco puggalo sorato hoti sukhasamvaso, abhinandanti sabrahmacari ekattavasena.
an6.44:7.2: Tassa savanenapi katam hoti, bahusaccenapi katam hoti, ditthiyapi patividdham hoti, samayikampi vimuttim labhati.
an6.44:7.3: So kayassa bheda param marana visesaya pareti no hanaya, visesagamiyeva hoti no hanagami.
an6.44:8.2: ‘imassapi teva dhamma aparassapi teva dhamma, kasma tesam eko hino eko panito’ti.
an6.44:8.3: Tanhi tesam, ananda, hoti digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya.
an6.44:9.1: Tatrananda, yvayam puggalo sorato hoti sukhasamvaso, abhinandanti sabrahmacari ekattavasena, tassa savanenapi katam hoti, bahusaccenapi katam hoti, ditthiyapi patividdham hoti, samayikampi vimuttim labhati.
an6.44:9.2: Ayam, ananda, puggalo amuna purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca.
an6.44:9.9: Aham va, ananda, puggalesu pamanam ganheyyam, yo va panassa madiso.
an6.44:10.1: Idha panananda, ekaccassa puggalassa kodhamano adhigato hoti, samayena samayancassa lobhadhamma uppajjanti.
an6.44:10.2: Tassa savanenapi akatam hoti, bahusaccenapi akatam hoti, ditthiyapi appatividdham hoti, samayikampi vimuttim na labhati.
an6.44:10.3: So kayassa bheda param marana hanaya pareti no visesaya, hanagamiyeva hoti no visesagami.
an6.44:11.1: Idha panananda, ekaccassa puggalassa kodhamano adhigato hoti, samayena samayancassa lobhadhamma uppajjanti.
an6.44:13.1: Idha panananda, ekaccassa puggalassa kodhamano adhigato hoti, samayena samayancassa vacisankhara uppajjanti.
an6.44:13.2: Tassa savanenapi akatam hoti …pe… samayikampi vimuttim na labhati.
an6.44:13.3: So kayassa bheda param marana hanaya pareti no visesaya, hanagamiyeva hoti no visesagami.
an6.44:14.1: Idha panananda, ekaccassa puggalassa kodhamano adhigato hoti, samayena samayancassa vacisankhara uppajjanti.
an6.44:14.2: Tassa savanenapi katam hoti, bahusaccenapi katam hoti, ditthiyapi patividdham hoti, samayikampi vimuttim labhati.
an6.44:14.3: So kayassa bheda param marana visesaya pareti no hanaya, visesagamiyeva hoti no hanagami.
an6.44:15.2: ‘imassapi teva dhamma, aparassapi teva dhamma. Kasma tesam eko hino, eko panito’ti?
an6.44:15.3: Tanhi tesam, ananda, hoti digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya.
an6.44:16.1: Tatrananda, yassa puggalassa kodhamano adhigato hoti, samayena samayancassa vacisankhara uppajjanti, tassa savanenapi katam hoti, bahusaccenapi katam hoti, ditthiyapi patividdham hoti, samayikampi vimuttim labhati.
an6.44:16.2: Ayam, ananda, puggalo amuna purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca.
an6.44:16.9: Aham va, ananda, puggalesu pamanam ganheyyam, yo va panassa madiso.
an6.44:17.1: Ka cananda, migasala upasika bala abyatta ammaka ammakapanna, ke ca purisapuggalaparopariyanane.
an6.44:17.2: Ime kho, ananda, cha puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an6.44:18.1: Yatharupena, ananda, silena purano samannagato ahosi, tatharupena silena isidatto samannagato abhavissa. Nayidha purano isidattassa gatimpi annassa.
an6.44:18.2: Yatharupaya ca, ananda, pannaya isidatto samannagato ahosi, tatharupaya pannaya purano samannagato abhavissa. Nayidha isidatto puranassa gatimpi annassa.
an6.44:18.3: Iti kho, ananda, ime puggala ubho ekangahina”ti.
